properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 6 at 8:17AM CST until February 7 at 8:22AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Advisory continues for the Elk River...

Elk River Near Pelham affecting Grundy County

. Heavy rainfall has caused the Elk River near Pelham to rise above Action
Stage. The river will remain high into Friday.

The Flood Advisory continues for
The Elk River Near Pelham
* Until Friday morning.
* At 08AM Thursday the stage was 12.1 feet.
* The river will continue to rise to around 12.5 feet.
* Action stage is 11.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* At 14.0 feet...Water reaches a house on the left bank downstream of gauge.
Water may inundate parts of Bells Mills Rd between Interstate 24 and US-41
(Dixie Highway).
* At 11.0 feet...Water begins to inundate low lying wooded and agricultural
areas along the river.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
